title: Spiritual Warfare for the End Times: How to Defeat the Enemy
description: How to Defeat the Enemy During These Dark DaysAs the time approaches for Jesus' return, the spiritual battle between good and evil is heating up. Evidence is all shootings, genocide, civil wars, increased persecution. Our enemy is real, and it seems as if he is winning.The good news is that God is at work in powerful ways--and that Satan is not winning. But we need to know how to wage war against him and his plans for these turbulent days. We must understand not only the intensified warfare environment of the end times, but how we can walk in our authority in Jesus Christ. Here are the practical insights you need on how to fight using the spiritual weapons God has given the blood of Jesus, the Word of God, our own testimony, and more. When we learn how to wield these weapons, we will see victory over Satan and his kingdom and bring hope to these dark days.
author: Derek Prince
